p: Antioxidant activity of A. vera extracts were measured in terms of hydrogen donating radical scavenging ability using the stable DPPH method of Zhu et al. [ 27]. The reaction was monitored as a color change from purple to pale yellow. A quantity of 1 ml (1 mg/ml) of Aloe vera extract was added to 2 ml of 0.5 mM DPPH solution in methanol and the reaction mixture was kept in the dark for 45 min.
